bibl.title: Letter from Landon C. Bell to Henry Rose Carter, October 5, 1916

div1.p: Bell gives Carter a status of report on the work in South Carolina.

div1.head: Letter from Landon C. Bell to Henry Rose Carter, October 5, 1916
div1.opener:
THE COLLETON CYPRESS COMPANY
MANUFACTURERS OF
CYPRESS AND PINE LUMBER
LATH AND SHINGLES
GENERAL OFFICES: COLUMBUS, OHIO
SPECIALTIES
WIDE CLEAR
CYPRESS
CYPRESS MOULDINGS
AND FINISH
MILLS, COLLETON, S. C.
EASTERN SALES OFFICE
238 LAND TITLE BLDG.
PHILADELPHIA, PA.
Columbus, Ohio, October 5, 1916.
Dr. H. R. Carter,
Marine Hospital,
Baltimore, Md.
Dear Sir:-
div1.p:
I beg to acknowledge receipt of your letter of September
29th and am very glad to know that you are back home.

I too have been very much disappointed that the map to ac-
company Mr. Hayne's report has not been completed, but I have taken
pretty vigorous steps to have it completed promptly and I will supply
you with a copy of it.

In this connection you may be interested in a report of a
brief visit to the swamp made by Dr. Robert Wilson of Charleston, S.C.,
a copy of which I am herewith enclosing you.
div1.closer:
Very truly yours, Landon C Bell
General Counsel. LCB/N
Enc.
